# init()

**Initializer**

Creates an empty range.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Creating a range

- **init(location:length:)**: Creates a range with the given location and length.

items.description: Creates a range with the given location and length.
items.name: init(location:length:)

title: init()
